Occupying a 573m2 (approx.) block, this soaring double-storey home will instantly wow with filtered view of the Dandenong's, multiple light-filled living areas offering a spacious feel throughout that results in homely appeal.

Stylishly Renovated With Something For Everyone
If you have been searching for your ideal family home, one that is turn-key ready and has something to keep the kids, keen entertainers and tradespeople satisfied, this stylishly renovated property ticks all the boxes.
Tucked away within a lovely tree-lined court, it boasts an idyllic setting plus a beautifully presented interior that is enriched with engineered Blackbutt timber flooring, Victorian Ash feature beams and a fresh colour scheme.
Discover an open living/dining room with study area spilling out to a newly decked covered alfresco that overlooks Birts Hill and a large, secure backyard.
The stunning statement kitchen features Fisher & Paykel cooking appliances, a Schweigen rangehood, Caesarstone benches plus generous built-in and butler's pantry storage.
Three sizeable, robed bedrooms are serviced by a central bathroom and separate toilet.
Extras include: ducted heating, evaporative cooling, linen press and laundry storage, a single carport and powered 4-car garage.
The property is located near buses, Warrien Reserve, kindergartens, primary schools, Luther College, Yarra Valley Grammar, shops and Croydon Train Station.
